wrath.common.scripts

Class ScriptManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.common.scripts.ScriptManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PythonScriptManager

    public abstract class ScriptManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage Script and all-things scripting.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScriptManager

        protected ScriptManager(java.lang.Object parentObject,
                        java.lang.String fileExtension)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        parentObject - The object scripts should refer to.
        fileExtension - The file extension of scripts that should be detected. For example, Python would use '.py'.

    • Method Detail

      • closeScripting

        public static void closeScripting()
        Closes all resources associated with scripting. Scripting can not occur after this is called.

      • getScriptConfig

        public static wrath.util.Config getScriptConfig()
        Gets the Config associated with all Script Managers.
        Returns:
        Returns the Config associated with all Script Managers.

      • getScriptLogger

        public static wrath.util.Logger getScriptLogger()
        Gets the Logger associated with all Script Managers.
        Returns:
        Returns the Logger associated with all Script Managers.

      • addScriptEventHandler

        public void addScriptEventHandler(ScriptEventHandler handler)
        Adds a ScriptEventHandler to the list of handlers to respond to events.
        Parameters:
        handler - The ScriptEventHandler to add to the listeners list.

      • compileScript

        public java.lang.Object compileScript(Script script)
        Compiled a script into a compiled Object that can be executed.
        Parameters:
        script - The Script to compile.
        Returns:
        Returns the compiled Object.

      • close

        public void close()
        Called to close and deallocate all resources associated with this Script Manager.

      • executeCode

        public void executeCode(java.lang.String[] code)
        Executes specified code in the scripting language's interactive console.
        Parameters:
        code - The code to execute in console.

      • executeObject

        protected void executeObject(java.lang.Object compiledObject,
                             boolean dedicatedThread)
        Executes an executable object into the language's interpreter.
        Parameters:
        compiledObject - The compiled Object of a previously-compiled Script.
        dedicatedThread - If true, a new Thread is made to execute the script.

      • loadScript

        public Script loadScript(java.io.File scriptFile,
                         boolean autoCompile,
                         boolean autoExecute)
        Loads a Script into an object.
        Parameters:
        scriptFile - The File where the script is located.
        autoCompile - If true, the script will automatically be compiled.
        autoExecute - If true, the script will be executed as soon as it is compiled.
        Returns:
        Returns the Script object.

      • loadScriptsFromDirectory

        public Script[] loadScriptsFromDirectory(java.io.File directory,
                                         boolean autoCompile,
                                         boolean autoExecute)
        Loads loadScript(java.io.File, boolean, boolean) for every script file in specified directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to load all scripts in.
        autoCompile - If true, all scripts are compiled upon loading.
        autoExecute - If true, all scripts are executed upon compiling.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of Scripts that were loaded.

      • getScriptEventHandler

        public ScriptEventHandler getScriptEventHandler()
        Gets the root ScriptEventHandler to report events occuring.
        Returns:
        Returns the root ScriptEventHandler to report events occuring.
